metadata.title: WINS Local Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability
metadata.description: WINS in Microsoft Windows Server 2003 SP2 and Server 2008 SP2, R2, and R2 SP1 allows local users to gain privileges by sending crafted packets over the loopback interface, aka "WINS Local Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability."

extend_definition.comment: Microsoft Windows Server 2003 SP2 (x86) is installed
Microsoft Windows Server 2003 SP2 (x64) is installed
Microsoft Windows Server 2003 (ia64) SP2 is installed

criterion.comment: the version of wins.exe is less than 5.2.3790.4893

extend_definition.comment: Microsoft Windows Server 2008 (32-bit) Service Pack 2 is installed
Microsoft Windows Server 2008 x64 Edition Service Pack 2 is installed

criterion.comment: the version of wins.exe is less than 6.0.6002.18501
the version of wins.exe is less than 6.0.6002.22693
the version of wins.exe is greater than or equal 6.0.6002.22000

extend_definition.comment: Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 x64 Edition is installed

criterion.comment: the version of wins.exe is less than 6.1.7600.16861
the version of wins.exe is less than 6.1.7600.21024
the version of wins.exe is greater than or equal 6.1.7600.21000

criteria.comment: Vulnerable Windows Server 2008 R2 x64 SP1

extend_definition.comment: Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 x64 Service Pack 1 is installed

criterion.comment: the version of wins.exe is less than 6.1.7601.17664
the version of wins.exe is less than 6.1.7601.21786
the version of wins.exe is greater than or equal 6.1.7601.21000
